titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Stanford University Student Organizations Website Collection SC1204
Stanford University Student Organization Website Collection
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Josh Schneider

publicationstmt.publisher: Dept. of Special Collections & University Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2014-07-11T11:49-0700

did.unittitle: Stanford University Student Organization Website Collection

repository.corpname: Dept. of Special Collections & University Archives

did.abstract: The Stanford University Student Organization Website Collection, 2010-2014, includes website files for Stanford University volunteer student organizations.
did.physloc: Special Collections and University Archives materials are stored offsite and must be paged 36-48 hours in advance. For more information on paging collections, see the department's website: http://library.stanford.edu/spc.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Stanford University Student Organization Website Collection, 2014, includes website files for Stanford University volunteer student organizations.

accessrestrict.head: Access to Collection
accessrestrict.p: The materials are currently closed to research use, pending the implementation of an access mechanism for the delivery of WARC files. These materials can be accessed online at their original locations. Audio-visual materials are not available in original format, and must be reformatted to a digital use copy.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: All requests to reproduce, publish, quote from, or otherwise use collection materials must be submitted in writing to the Head of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, California 94305-6064. Consent is given on behalf of Special Collections as the owner of the physical items and is not intended to include or imply permission from the copyright owner. Such permission must be obtained from the copyright owner, heir(s) or assigns. See: http://library.stanford.edu/spc/using-collections/permission-publish.
Restrictions also apply to digital representations of the original materials. Use of digital files is restricted to research and educational purposes.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [identification of item], CStanford University Student organization Website Collection (SC1204). Dept. of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.
